div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2248 Serra Orlando (anc. Morgantina), 4 km. NE of Piazza Armerina, 1958 Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 152 AE. From excavations "From 3rd cent. Catana to early 2nd cent. Roman asses" Disposition: Syracuse Stillwell, AJA 1959, p. 168
